snippet: A roof resting on the ground on Staten Island, or an older woman using a gas stove for heat in a Housing Authority high-rise in Brooklyn — Hurricane Sandy’s destruction remained apparent in the New York region.
lead_paragraph: A roof resting on the ground on Staten Island, or an older woman using a gas stove for heat in a Housing Authority high-rise in Brooklyn — Hurricane Sandy’s destruction remained apparent in the New York region.

headline.seo: Two Weeks Later, the Devastation Lingers
